name: Notion Journals
description: Notion JournalsThe Journals template provides dedicated spaces to record your daily reflections while tracking your emotions.Key Features JOURNALS Create unlimited journals for all your needs ARCHIVE Archive journals that are no longer active TEMPLATES Create custom templates with writing prompts for any journal type EMOTION TRACKING Tag your daily emotions in each journal entry VISUAL CALENDAR Visually track your good and bad days at a glance. ENTRY LOG View entries by month or year. The Journa
